00043 MinkowskiError::MinkowskiError(MultilayerPerceptron* newMultilayerPerceptron, 
00044 InputTargetDataSet* newInputTargetDataSet): ObjectiveFunctional(newMultilayerPerceptron)

00118 // void setMinkowskiParameter(double) method
00119 
00124 
00125 void MinkowskiError::setMinkowskiParameter(double newMinkowskiParameter)
00126 {
00127    // Control sentence
00128 
00129    if(newMinkowskiParameter < 1.0 || newMinkowskiParameter > 2.0)
00130    {
00131       std::cerr << std::endl
00132                 << "Flood Error. MinkowskiError class." << std::endl
00133                 << "void setMinkowskiParameter(double) method." << std::endl
00134                 << "The Minkowski parameter must be comprised between 1 and 2" << std::endl
00135                 << std::endl;
00136     
00137       exit(1);
00138    }
00139 
00140    // Set Minkowski parameter
00141   
00142    minkowskiParameter = newMinkowskiParameter;
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00147 
00152 
00153 double MinkowskiError::calculateEvaluation(void)
00154 {
00155     // Control sentence 
00156 
00157    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00158    {
00159       std::cerr << std::endl
00160                 << "Flood Error: MinkowskiError class." << std::endl
00161                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00162                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00163                 << std::endl;
00164 
00165       exit(1);
00166    }
00167    else if(inputTargetDataSet == NULL)
00168    {
00169       std::cerr << std::endl
00170                 << "Flood Error: MinkowskiError class." << std::endl
00171                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00172                 << "Pointer to input-target data set object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00173                 << std::endl;
00174 
00175       exit(1);
00176    }
00177 
00178 
00179    double minkowskiError = 0.0;
00180 
00181    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00182    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00183 
00184    // Input-target data set
00185 
00186    int numberOfSamples = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfSamples();
00187    int numberOfInputVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfInputVariables();
00188    int numberOfTargetVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfTargetVariables();
00189 
00190    if(numberOfInputs != numberOfInputVariables || numberOfOutputs != numberOfTargetVariables)
00191    {
00192       std::cout << std::endl
00193                 << "Flood Error MinkowskiError class." << std::endl
00194                                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00195                 << "Number of inputs and outputs in multilayer perceptron must be equal to number of input and "
00196                                 << "output variables in input-target data set." 
00197                 << std::endl << std::endl;
00198 
00199       exit(1);
00200    }
00201 
00202    Matrix<double>& inputData = inputTargetDataSet->getInputData();
00203    Matrix<double>& targetData = inputTargetDataSet->getTargetData();
00204 
00205    // Increment number of evaluations
00206 
00207    numberOfEvaluations++;
00208 
00209    double error = 0.0;  
00210 
00211    Vector<double> input(numberOfInputs);
00212    Vector<double> output(numberOfOutputs);
00213    Vector<double> target(numberOfTargetVariables);
00214 
00215    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00216    {
00217       // Input vector
00218 
00219       input = inputData.getRow(sample);
00220 
00221       // Output vector
00222 
00223       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00224 
00225       // Target vector
00226 
00227      target = targetData.getRow(sample);
00228 
00229       // Minkowski error
00230 
00231       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfOutputs; j++)
00232       {
00233          error = fabs(output[j] - target[j]);
00234            
00235          minkowskiError += pow(error, minkowskiParameter);
00236       }
00237    }
00238 
00239    return(minkowskiError);
00240 }

00242 
00243 // Vector<double> calculateGradient(void)
00244 //
00249 
00250 Vector<double> MinkowskiError::calculateGradient(void)
00251 {
00252    // Multilayer perceptron 
00253 
00254    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00255 
00256    int numberOfHiddenLayers = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
00257    Vector<int> numbersOfHiddenNeurons = multilayerPerceptron->getNumbersOfHiddenNeurons();
00258 
00259    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00260 
00261    MultilayerPerceptron::PreAndPostProcessingMethod preAndPostProcessingMethod
00262    = multilayerPerceptron->getPreAndPostProcessingMethod();
00263 
00264    Vector<double> meanOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getMeanOfOutputVariables();
00265    Vector<double> standardDeviationOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getStandardDeviationOfOutputVariables();
00266 
00267    Vector<double> minimumOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getMinimumOfOutputVariables();
00268    Vector<double> maximumOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getMaximumOfOutputVariables();
00269 
00270    Vector<Perceptron>& outputLayer = multilayerPerceptron->getOutputLayer();
00271    Vector< Vector<Perceptron> >& hiddenLayers = multilayerPerceptron->getHiddenLayers();
00272 
00273    int numberOfNeuralParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
00274    Vector<double> synapticWeights;
00275 
00276    // Input-target data set
00277 
00278    int numberOfSamples = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfSamples();
00279    int numberOfTargetVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfTargetVariables();
00280 
00281    Matrix<double>& inputData = inputTargetDataSet->getInputData();
00282    Matrix<double>& targetData = inputTargetDataSet->getTargetData();
00283 
00284    Vector<double> target(numberOfTargetVariables);
00285 
00286    // Input, outputs, gradient
00287 
00288    Vector<double> input(numberOfInputs);
00289    Vector<double> inputSignal(numberOfInputs);
00290    Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00291    Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00292    Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00293    Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayer(numberOfOutputs);
00294    Vector<double> outputSignal(numberOfOutputs);
00295    Vector<double> output(numberOfOutputs);
00296    Vector<double> gradient(numberOfNeuralParameters, 0.0);
00297 
00298    // Output and hidden errors
00299 
00300    Vector<double> outputError(numberOfOutputs);
00301    Vector< Vector<double> > hiddenError(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00302 
00303    for(int h = 0; h < numberOfHiddenLayers; h++)
00304    {
00305       hiddenError[h].setSize(numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]);
00306    }
00307 
00308    // Main loop
00309 
00310    double sum;
00311    int index;
00312 
00313    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00314    {
00315       // Actual input
00316 
00317       input = inputData.getRow(sample);
00318 
00319       // Preprocess input to obtain input signal to the neural network 
00320 
00321       inputSignal = multilayerPerceptron->preprocessInput(input);
00322 
00323       // Calculate net input output and output signal derivative from all hidden layers
00324 
00325       netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0] 
00326       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignal);
00327 
00328       outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[0] 
00329       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
00330 
00331       outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[0] 
00332       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
00333   
00334       for(int h = 1; h < numberOfHiddenLayers; h++)
00335       {
00336          netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[h] = multilayerPerceptron
00337          ->calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(h, outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[h-1]);
00338    
00339          outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[h] = multilayerPerceptron
00340          ->calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(h, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[h]);
00341 
00342          outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[h] = multilayerPerceptron
00343          ->calculateOutputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(h, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[h]);         
00344       }
00345 
00346       // Get net input signal to output layer
00347 
00348       netInputSignalToOutputLayer = multilayerPerceptron
00349       ->calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
00350 
00351       // Get actual output signal from output layer
00352 
00353       Vector<double> outputSignal = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
00354 
00355       // Get actual output signal derivative from output layer
00356 
00357       Vector<double> outputSignalDerivative
00358       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignalDerivative(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
00359 
00360       // Postprocess output signal from the neural network to get output
00361 
00362       Vector<double> output = multilayerPerceptron->postprocessOutputSignal(outputSignal);
00363 
00364       // Actual target
00365 
00366       Vector<double> target = targetData.getRow(sample);
00367 
00368       // Evaluate the error for all the output units      
00369      
00370       switch(preAndPostProcessingMethod)
00371       {
00372          case MultilayerPerceptron::None:
00373          {
00374             for(int j = 0; j < numberOfOutputs; j++)
00375             {
00376                if(output[j] - target[j] >= 0.0)
00377                 {
00378                    outputError[j] = outputSignalDerivative[j]
00379                    *minkowskiParameter*pow(fabs(output[j] - target[j]), minkowskiParameter-1.0);
00380                 }
00381                 else
00382                 {
00383                    outputError[j] = outputSignalDerivative[j]
00384                    *(-1.0)*minkowskiParameter*pow(fabs(output[j] - target[j]), minkowskiParameter-1.0);                 
00385                 }
00386             }
00387          }//end none
00388          break;
00389 
00390          case MultilayerPerceptron::MeanAndStandardDeviation:
00391          {
00392             for(int j = 0; j < numberOfOutputs; j++)
00393             {
00394                if(output[j] - target[j] >= 0.0)
00395                {
00396                   outputError[j] = outputSignalDerivative[j]
00397                   *minkowskiParameter*pow(fabs(output[j] - target[j]), minkowskiParameter-1.0)
00398                   *standardDeviationOfOutputVariables[j];
00399                }
00400                else
00401                {
00402                   outputError[j] = outputSignalDerivative[j]
00403                   *(-1.0)*minkowskiParameter*pow(fabs(output[j] - target[j]), minkowskiParameter-1.0)
00404                   *standardDeviationOfOutputVariables[j];                 
00405                }
00406             }
00407          }// end meand and standard deviation         
00408          break;
00409 
00410          case MultilayerPerceptron::MinimumAndMaximum:
00411          {
00412             for(int j = 0; j < numberOfOutputs; j++)
00413             {
00414                if(output[j] - target[j] >= 0.0)
00415                {
00416                   outputError[j] = outputSignalDerivative[j]
00417                   *minkowskiParameter*pow(fabs(output[j] - target[j]), minkowskiParameter-1.0)
00418                   *0.5*(maximumOfOutputVariables[j]-minimumOfOutputVariables[j]);
00419                }
00420                else
00421                {
00422                   outputError[j] = outputSignalDerivative[j]
00423                   *(-1.0)*minkowskiParameter*pow(fabs(output[j] - target[j]), minkowskiParameter-1.0)
00424                   *0.5*(maximumOfOutputVariables[j]-minimumOfOutputVariables[j]);                 
00425                }
00426             }
00427          }//end minimum and maximum
00428          break;
00429 
00430       }//end switch     
00431 
00432       // Backpropagate the output errors to obtain the hidden errors
00433 
00434       // Last hidden layer
00435 
00436       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]; j++)
00437       {
00438          sum = 0.0;
00439 
00440          for(int k = 0; k < numberOfOutputs; k++)
00441          {
00442             synapticWeights = outputLayer[k].getSynapticWeights();
00443             sum += (synapticWeights[j])*outputError[k];
00444          }
00445 
00446          hiddenError[numberOfHiddenLayers-1][j] = outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1][j]*sum;
00447       }
00448 
00449       // Rest of hidden layers
00450 
00451       for(int h = numberOfHiddenLayers-2; h >= 0; h--) 
00452       {   
00453          for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]; j++)
00454          {
00455             sum = 0.0;
00456 
00457             for(int k = 0; k < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h+1]; k++)
00458             {
00459                synapticWeights = hiddenLayers[h+1][k].getSynapticWeights();
00460                sum += (synapticWeights[j])*hiddenError[h+1][k];
00461             }            
00462           
00463             hiddenError[h][j] = outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[h][j]*sum;
00464          }
00465       }
00466 
00467       // Calculate gradient elements
00468 
00469       index = 0;
00470 
00471       // Calculate gradient elements of hidden neurons
00472 
00473       // First hidden layer
00474 
00475       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[0]; j++)
00476       {
00477          // Bias
00478 
00479          gradient[index] += hiddenError[0][j];
00480          index++;
00481 
00482          // Synaptic weights
00483 
00484          synapticWeights = hiddenLayers[0][j].getSynapticWeights();
00485 
00486          for(int k = 0; k < numberOfInputs; k++)
00487          {
00488             gradient[index] += hiddenError[0][j]*inputSignal[k];
00489             index++;   
00490          }
00491       }
00492 
00493       // Rest of hidden layers  
00494     
00495       for(int h = 1; h < numberOfHiddenLayers; h++)
00496       {      
00497          for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]; j++)
00498          {
00499             // Bias
00500 
00501             gradient[index] += hiddenError[h][j];
00502             index++;
00503 
00504             // Synaptic weights
00505 
00506             synapticWeights = hiddenLayers[h][j].getSynapticWeights();
00507 
00508             for(int k = 0; k < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h-1]; k++)
00509             {
00510                gradient[index] += hiddenError[h][j]*outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[h-1][k];
00511                index++;   
00512             }
00513          }
00514       }
00515 
00516       // Calculate gradient elements of output neurons
00517 
00518       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfOutputs; j++)
00519       {
00520          // Bias
00521 
00522          gradient[index] += outputError[j];
00523          index++;
00524 
00525          // Synaptic weights
00526 
00527          for(int k = 0; k < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]; k++)
00528          {
00529             gradient[index] += outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1][k]*outputError[j];
00530             index++;
00531          }
00532       }
00533    }
00534 
00535    return(gradient);
00536 }

00539 // void saveInputTargetAndOutput(char*) method
00540 
00545 
00546 void MinkowskiError::saveInputTargetAndOutput(char* filename)
00547 {
00548    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00549    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00550 
00551    int numberOfSamples = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfSamples();
00552    int numberOfInputVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfInputVariables();
00553    int numberOfTargetVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfTargetVariables();
00554 
00555    Matrix<double> inputData = inputTargetDataSet->getInputData();
00556    Matrix<double> targetData = inputTargetDataSet->getTargetData();
00557 
00558    Matrix<double> outputData(numberOfSamples, numberOfOutputs);
00559 
00560    Vector<double> input(numberOfInputs);
00561    Vector<double> output(numberOfOutputs);
00562 
00563    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00564    {
00565       input = inputData.getRow(sample);
00566 
00567       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00568 
00569       outputData.setRow(sample, output);
00570    }
00571 
00572    std::fstream file; 
00573 
00574    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00575 
00576    // Control sentence
00577 
00578    if(!file.is_open())
00579    {
00580       std::cout << std::endl
00581                 << "Flood Error MinkowskiError class." << std::endl
00582                 << "void saveInputTargetAndOutput(char*) method." << std::endl
00583                 << "Cannot open input-target-output data file." << std::endl
00584                 << std::endl;
00585 
00586       exit(1);
00587    }
00588    else
00589    {
00590       if(display)
00591      {
00592          std::cout << std::endl
00593                    << "Saving input-target-output to data file..." << std::endl;
00594      }
00595    }
00596 
00597    // Write file header
00598  
00599    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Input-target-output data file." << std::endl
00600         << "% 1 - Input data" << std::endl
00601         << "% 2 - Target data" << std::endl
00602         << "% 3 - Output data" << std::endl
00603         << std::endl;
00604 
00605    // Write file data    
00606 
00607    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00608    {
00609       // Write sample input data
00610 
00611       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputVariables; i++)
00612       {
00613          file << inputData[sample][i] << " ";
00614       }
00615 
00616       // Write sample target data
00617 
00618       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfTargetVariables; i++)
00619       {
00620          file << targetData[sample][i] << " ";
00621       }
00622 
00623       // Write sample output data
00624 
00625       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
00626       {
00627          file << outputData[sample][i] << " ";
00628       }
00629 
00630       file << std::endl;
00631    }
00632 
00633    file << std::endl;
00634 
00635    file.close();
00636 }
